cards.name: Dacey Mormont
cards.text:
Renown.
X is the number of [stark] characters you control.

cards.name: Winterfell Archery Range
cards.text: Action: During a [military] challenge, kneel Winterfell Archery Range to choose a participating character with STR 3 or lower, and remove it from the challenge.

cards.name: Oldtown Informer
cards.text: Ambush (2). Bestow (3). Reaction: After a card enters play during the challenges phase, draw X cards. Then, discard X cards. X is the number of gold Oldtown Informer has.

cards.name: Arbor Vineyard
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Arbor Vineyard to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if there are more Summer plot cards than Winter plot cards revealed.)

cards.name: Othell Yarwyck
cards.text: Action: Kneel a [thenightswatch] location to choose a [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a challenge icon of your choice.

cards.name: Improved Fortifications
cards.text: Location only. Interrupt: When attached location would leave play, sacrifice Improved Fortifications to save it.

cards.name: Ser Axell Florent
cards.text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Axell Florent is participating, discard 1 gold from him to choose and kneel a character without attachments.

cards.name: Saving the Kingdom
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose and kneel a character with STR 3 or lower. That character cannot stand during the standing phase this round. Reaction: After you win dominance, pay 1 gold to return Saving the Kingdom from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Ser Osmund Kettleblack
cards.text: Bestow (3). Challenges Action: Discard 1 gold from Ser Osmund Kettleblack to put a Knight character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved). (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Tywin's Stratagem
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose a character with printed cost 2 or lower controlled by each player. Return each of those characters to its owner's hand. Reaction: After a character is discarded from an opponent's hand or deck, pay 1 gold to return Tywin's Stratagem from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Silence's Crew
cards.text: Bestow (3). No attachments. Pillage. Silence's Crew gets +2 STR for each gold it has. Reaction: After Silence's Crew discards a location or attachment using pillage, place 1 gold from the treasury on Silence's Crew.

cards.name: Plunder
cards.text: Action: Kneel your faction card to choose an opponent. Gain 1 gold for each location and attachment in that player's discard pile.

cards.name: Strong Belwas
cards.text: Bestow (2). Interrupt: When another unique [targaryen] character would be killed, discard 1 gold from Strong Belwas to save it. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Breaker of Chains
cards.text: Unique [targaryen] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR for each character you control with printed cost 2 or lower. Reaction: After attached character is declared as an attacker, put a character with printed cost 2 or lower into play from your hand.

cards.name: Ellaria Sand
cards.text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Ellaria Sand is participating, discard 1 gold from her to stand each Bastard character you control.

cards.name: Secret Schemes
cards.text: Action: Kneel your faction card to draw X cards. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.

cards.name: Walder Frey
cards.text: Renown. While Walder Frey is attacking, each other House Frey character you control is also considered to be attacking.

cards.name: Frey Bastard
cards.text: Bestow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control 2 or more attacking House Frey characters, discard 1 gold from Frey Bastard to gain 1 power for your faction.

cards.name: Frey Hospitality
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking House Frey character, if it was the third challenge you initiated this phase, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent. (Choose and kill 3 characters instead if you won by 20 or more STR.)

cards.name: The Red Wedding
cards.text: Interrupt: When you win a challenge as the attacking player, choose and kill a Lord or Lady character controlled by the losing opponent. (Any player may initiate this ability.)
